indicator_name: Grado en que el marco jurídico garantiza la igualdad de derechos de la mujer a la propiedad o el control de tierras
national_indicator_description: Grado en que el marco jurídico garantiza la igualdad de derechos de la mujer a la propiedad o el control de tierras
target_name: Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws
goal_name: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
computation_units: Range (1=No evidence to 6=Highest levels of guarantees)
source_organisation_1: Elaborated by SADEI based on data from the sources detailed in the methodology
graph_title: Grado en que el marco jurídico garantiza la igualdad de derechos de la mujer a la propiedad o el control de tierras
